text: Los Santos Forest Reserve (), is a protected area in Costa Rica, managed under the Central Conservation Area and Pacific La Amistad Conservation Area, it was created in 1975 by decree 5389-A. This forest reserve surrounds the Los Quetzales National Park. == Ramsar site == Part of the Ramsar site is located within this protected area and shared with Tapantí National Park, Macho River Forest Reserve, Vueltas Hill Biological Reserve and Chirripó National Park. == References == Category:Costa Rica Category:Protected areas Category:Nature reserves in Costa Rica Category:Protected areas established in 1975 Category:Ramsar sites in Costa Rica
title: Los Santos Forest Reserve
